fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile.

fields.name: Position
fields.description: A Position vector specifying the absolute target position.

fields.name: Speed
fields.description: An optional Speed.

fields.name: PanTilt
fields.description: Pan and tilt position. The x component corresponds to pan and the y component to tilt.

fields.name: Zoom
fields.description: A zoom position.

fields.name: space
fields.description: Pan/tilt coordinate space selector. The following options are defined: http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/TranslationGenericSpace http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/VelocityGenericSpace http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/GenericSpeedSpace

fields.name: space
fields.description: Zoom coordinate space selector. The following options are defined: http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/PositionGenericSpace http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/TranslationGenericSpace http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/VelocityGenericSpace http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/ZoomSpaces/ZoomGenericSpeedSpace

fields.name: PanTilt
fields.description: Pan and tilt speed. The x component corresponds to pan and the y component to tilt. If omitted in a request, the current (if any) PanTilt movement should not be affected.

fields.name: Zoom
fields.description: A zoom speed. If omitted in a request, the current (if any) Zoom movement should not be affected.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile.

fields.name: Velocity
fields.description: A Velocity vector specifying the velocity of pan, tilt and zoom.

fields.name: Timeout
fields.description: An optional Timeout parameter.

fields.name: ConfigurationToken
fields.description: Token of an existing configuration that the options are intended for.

fields.name: PTZConfigurationOptions
fields.description: The requested PTZ configuration options.

fields.name: Spaces
fields.description: A list of supported coordinate systems including their range limitations.

fields.name: PTZTimeout
fields.description: A timeout Range within which Timeouts are accepted by the PTZ Node.

fields.name: PTControlDirection
fields.description: Supported options for PT Direction Control.

fields.name: PTZRamps
fields.description: The list of acceleration ramps supported by the device. Thesmallest acceleration value corresponds to the minimal index, thehighest acceleration corresponds to the maximum index.

fields.name: AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace
fields.description: The Generic Pan/Tilt Position space is provided by every PTZ node that supports absolute Pan/Tilt, since it does not relate to a specific physical range. Instead, the range should be defined as the full range of the PTZ unit normalized to the range -1 to 1 resulting in the following space description.

fields.name: AbsoluteZoomPositionSpace
fields.description: The Generic Zoom Position Space is provided by every PTZ node that supports absolute Zoom, since it does not relate to a specific physical range. Instead, the range should be defined as the full range of the Zoom normalized to the range 0 (wide) to 1 (tele). There is no assumption about how the generic zoom range is mapped to magnification, FOV or other physical zoom dimension.

fields.name: RelativePanTiltTranslationSpace
fields.description: The Generic Pan/Tilt translation space is provided by every PTZ node that supports relative Pan/Tilt, since it does not relate to a specific physical range. Instead, the range should be defined as the full positive and negative translation range of the PTZ unit normalized to the range -1 to 1, where positive translation would mean clockwise rotation or movement in right/up direction resulting in the following space description.

fields.name: RelativeZoomTranslationSpace
fields.description: The Generic Zoom Translation Space is provided by every PTZ node that supports relative Zoom, since it does not relate to a specific physical range. Instead, the corresponding absolute range should be defined as the full positive and negative translation range of the Zoom normalized to the range -1 to1, where a positive translation maps to a movement in TELE direction. The translation is signed to indicate direction (negative is to wide, positive is to tele). There is no assumption about how the generic zoom range is mapped to magnification, FOV or other physical zoom dimension. This results in the following space description.

fields.name: ContinuousPanTiltVelocitySpace
fields.description: The generic Pan/Tilt velocity space shall be provided by every PTZ node, since it does not relate to a specific physical range. Instead, the range should be defined as a range of the PTZ unit’s speed normalized to the range -1 to 1, where a positive velocity would map to clockwise rotation or movement in the right/up direction. A signed speed can be independently specified for the pan and tilt component resulting in the following space description.

fields.name: ContinuousZoomVelocitySpace
fields.description: The generic zoom velocity space specifies a zoom factor velocity without knowing the underlying physical model. The range should be normalized from -1 to 1, where a positive velocity would map to TELE direction. A generic zoom velocity space description resembles the following.

fields.name: PanTiltSpeedSpace
fields.description: The speed space specifies the speed for a Pan/Tilt movement when moving to an absolute position or to a relative translation. In contrast to the velocity spaces, speed spaces do not contain any directional information. The speed of a combined Pan/Tilt movement is represented by a single non-negative scalar value.

fields.name: ZoomSpeedSpace
fields.description: The speed space specifies the speed for a Zoom movement when moving to an absolute position or to a relative translation. In contrast to the velocity spaces, speed spaces do not contain any directional information.

fields.name: URI
fields.description: A URI of coordinate systems.

fields.name: XRange
fields.description: A range of x-axis.

fields.name: YRange
fields.description: A range of y-axis.

fields.name: URI
fields.description: A URI of coordinate systems.

fields.name: XRange
fields.description: A range of x-axis.

fields.name: EFlip
fields.description: Supported options for EFlip feature.

fields.name: Reverse
fields.description: Supported options for Reverse feature.

fields.name: Mode
fields.description: Options of EFlip mode parameter.

fields.name: Mode
fields.description: Options of Reverse mode parameter.

fields.name: PTZConfigurationToken
fields.description: Token of the requested PTZConfiguration.

fields.name: PTZConfiguration
fields.description: A requested PTZConfiguration.

fields.name: NodeToken
fields.description: A mandatory reference to the PTZ Node that the PTZ Configuration belongs to.

fields.name: DefaultAbsolutePantTiltPositionSpace
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports absolute Pan/Tilt movements, it shall specify one Absolute Pan/Tilt Position Space as default.

fields.name: DefaultAbsoluteZoomPositionSpace
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports absolute zoom movements, it shall specify one Absolute Zoom Position Space as default.

fields.name: DefaultRelativePanTiltTranslationSpace
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports relative Pan/Tilt movements, it shall specify one RelativePan/Tilt Translation Space as default.

fields.name: DefaultRelativeZoomTranslationSpace
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports relative zoom movements, it shall specify one Relative Zoom Translation Space as default.

fields.name: DefaultContinuousPanTiltVelocitySpace
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports continuous Pan/Tilt movements, it shall specify one Continuous Pan/Tilt Velocity Space as default.

fields.name: DefaultContinuousZoomVelocitySpace
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports continuous zoom movements, it shall specify one Continuous Zoom Velocity Space as default.

fields.name: DefaultPTZSpeed
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports absolute or relative PTZ movements, it shall specify corresponding default Pan/Tilt and Zoom speeds.

fields.name: DefaultPTZTimeout
fields.description: If the PTZ Node supports continuous movements, it shall specify a default timeout, after which the movement stops.

fields.name: PanTiltLimits
fields.description: The Pan/Tilt limits element should be present for a PTZ Node that supports an absolute Pan/Tilt. If the element is present it signals the support for configurable Pan/Tilt limits. If limits are enabled, the Pan/Tilt movements shall always stay within the specified range. The Pan/Tilt limits are disabled by setting the limits to –INF or +INF.

fields.name: ZoomLimits
fields.description: The Zoom limits element should be present for a PTZ Node that supports absolute zoom. If the element is present it signals the supports for configurable Zoom limits. If limits are enabled the zoom movements shall always stay within the specified range. The Zoom limits are disabled by settings the limits to -INF and +INF.

fields.name: MoveRamp
fields.description: The optional acceleration ramp used by the device when moving.

fields.name: PresetRamp
fields.description: The optional acceleration ramp used by the device when recalling presets.

fields.name: PresetTourRamp
fields.description: The optional acceleration ramp used by the device when executing PresetTours.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: User readable name. Length up to 64 characters.

fields.name: UseCount
fields.description: Number of internal references currently using this configuration. This informational parameter is read-only. Deprecated for Media2 Service.

fields.name: token
fields.description: Token that uniquely references this configuration. Length up to 64 characters.

fields.name: Range
fields.description: A range of pan tilt limits.

fields.name: Range
fields.description: A range of zoom limit

fields.name: PTControlDirection
fields.description: Optional element to configure PT Control Direction related features.

fields.name: EFlip
fields.description: Optional element to configure related parameters for E-Flip.

fields.name: Reverse
fields.description: Optional element to configure related parameters for reversing of PT Control Direction.

fields.name: Mode
fields.description: Parameter to enable/disable E-Flip feature.

fields.name: Mode
fields.description: Parameter to enable/disable Reverse feature.

fields.name: PTZConfiguration
fields.description: A list of all existing PTZConfigurations on the device.

fields.name: NodeToken
fields.description: Token of the requested PTZNode.

fields.name: PTZNode
fields.description: A requested PTZNode.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A unique identifier that is used to reference PTZ Nodes.

fields.name: SupportedPTZSpaces
fields.description: A list of Coordinate Systems available for the PTZ Node. For each Coordinate System, the PTZ Node MUST specify its allowed range.

fields.name: MaximumNumberOfPresets
fields.description: All preset operations MUST be available for this PTZ Node if one preset is supported.

fields.name: HomeSupported
fields.description: A boolean operator specifying the availability of a home position. If set to true, the Home Position Operations MUST be available for this PTZ Node.

fields.name: AuxiliaryCommands
fields.description: A list of supported Auxiliary commands. If the list is not empty, the Auxiliary Operations MUST be available for this PTZ Node.

fields.name: FixedHomePosition
fields.description: Indication whether the HomePosition of a Node is fixed or it can be changed via the SetHomePosition command.

fields.name: GeoMove
fields.description: Indication whether the Node supports the geo-referenced move command.

fields.name: token
fields.description: Unique identifier referencing the physical entity.

fields.name: SupportedPresetTour
fields.description: Detail of supported Preset Tour feature.

fields.name: MaximumNumberOfPresetTours
fields.description: Indicates number of preset tours that can be created. Required preset tour operations shall be available for this PTZ Node if one or more preset tour is supported.

fields.name: PTZPresetTourOperation
fields.description: Indicates which preset tour operations are available for this PTZ Node.

fields.name: PTZNode
fields.description: A list of the existing PTZ Nodes on the device.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the operation should take place.

fields.name: Preset
fields.description: A list of presets which are available for the requested MediaProfile.

fields.name: Name
fields.description: A list of preset position name.

fields.name: PTZPosition
fields.description: A list of preset position.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the PTZStatus should be requested.

fields.name: PTZStatus
fields.description: The PTZStatus for the requested MediaProfile.

fields.name: Position
fields.description: Specifies the absolute position of the PTZ unit together with the Space references. The default absolute spaces of the corresponding PTZ configuration MUST be referenced within the Position element.

fields.name: MoveStatus
fields.description: Indicates if the Pan/Tilt/Zoom device unit is currently moving, idle or in an unknown state.

fields.name: Error
fields.description: States a current PTZ error.

fields.name: UtcTime
fields.description: Specifies the UTC time when this status was generated.

fields.name: FieldOfView
fields.description: States the current field of view of the video stream.

fields.name: hfov
fields.description: Horizontal field-of-view in degrees.

fields.name: vfov
fields.description: Vertical field-of-view in degrees.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the operation should take place.

fields.name: Speed
fields.description: A requested speed.The speed parameter can only be specified when Speed Spaces are available for the PTZ Node.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the operation should take place.

fields.name: PresetToken
fields.description: A requested preset token.

fields.name: Speed
fields.description: A requested speed.The speed parameter can only be specified when Speed Spaces are available for the PTZ Node.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile.

fields.name: Translation
fields.description: A positional Translation relative to the current position

fields.name: Speed
fields.description: An optional Speed parameter.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the operation should take place.

fields.name: PresetToken
fields.description: A requested preset token.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the operation should take place.

fields.name: AuxiliaryData
fields.description: The Auxiliary request data.

fields.name: AuxiliaryResponse
fields.description: The response contains the auxiliary response.

fields.name: ForcePersistence
fields.description: Flag that makes configuration persistent. Example: User wants the configuration to exist after reboot.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the home position should be set.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile where the operation should take place.

fields.name: PresetName
fields.description: A requested preset name.

fields.name: PresetToken
fields.description: A requested preset token.

fields.name: PresetToken
fields.description: A token to the Preset which has been set.

fields.name: ProfileToken
fields.description: A reference to the MediaProfile that indicate what should be stopped.

fields.name: PanTilt
fields.description: Set true when we want to stop ongoing pan and tilt movements.If PanTilt arguments are not present, this command stops these movements.

fields.name: Zoom
fields.description: Set true when we want to stop ongoing zoom movement.If Zoom arguments are not present, this command stops ongoing zoom movement.
